(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Today))
    (VP (VBZ marks)
      (NP
        (NP (DT another) (NN milestone))
        (PP (IN in)
          (NP
            (NP (DT the) (NN life))
            (PP (IN of)
              (NP (DT the) (NN blog)))))))
    (. .)))

root(ROOT-0, marks-2)
det(milestone-4, another-3)
dobj(marks-2, milestone-4)
prep(milestone-4, in-5)
det(life-7, the-6)
pobj(in-5, life-7)
prep(life-7, of-8)
det(blog-10, the-9)
pobj(of-8, blog-10)

    (VP (MD shall)

        (VP (VBG making)
          (NP (PRP$ our) (JJ very) (JJ first) (NNP Makan) (NNP Mission) (NN trip))

    (, ,)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (S
      (NP (NNP Holydrummer))
      (VP (MD will)
        (VP (VB be)
          (VP (VBG following)
            (NP (PRP me))
            (PP (IN on)
              (NP (DT this) (NN trip)))))))
    (CC and)
    (S
      (NP (PRP we))
      (VP (MD will)
        (VP (VB be)
          (VP (VBN accompanied)
            (PP (IN by)
              (NP
                (NP (DT the) (NNPS Nuffnangers))
                (CC and)
                (NP (DT a) (JJ few) (JJ other) (NNS kakis))))))))
    (. .)))

    (NP (PRP It))

        (NP
          (QP (JJR more) (IN than) (RB just))
          (DT another) (NN food) (NN guide))))
    (, ,)))

aux(guide-9, will-2)
cop(guide-9, be-3)

num(guide-9, than-5)
quantmod(than-5, just-6)
det(guide-9, another-7)
nn(guide-9, food-8)
root(ROOT-0, guide-9)

    (NP
      (NP (JJR more))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP

          (PP (IN of)
            (NP (PRP$ our) (NN hawker) (NN culture))))))
    (. .)))

    (: :)))
